statement: The consolidated performance of the Company and its subsidiaries has shown resilience during the pandemic.
The Company has successfully launched Westside.com, expanding its online shopping capabilities.
The Company is confident in its ability to weather the ongoing crisis and rebound strongly.
The Company has a commitment to community development and has spent ₹ 319.65 Lakhs towards CSR projects.
The Company reported a loss after tax of ₹ 51.02 Crores for the financial year.
The total comprehensive loss for the year was ₹ 25.90 Crores.
The Company faced significant disruptions due to the pandemic, impacting sales performance.
The Company expects customer demand to rebound strongly, possibly starting in the second quarter.
The Company plans to continue scaling up its presence with a focus on sustainable profitability.
The Company envisions a gradual return to normalcy over the next few years.
The Company acknowledges the risks associated with changes in consumer expectations and competition.
Regulatory risks related to changes in tax laws and compliance requirements could impact operations.
The Company is exposed to liquidity risks and is actively managing its cash flow to mitigate potential impacts.
